description: You'll love the super quiet location & neighbourhood of this townhome! Located just steps away from the new Blakeburn Lagoon Park. This home features a bonus loft style layout which gives the top bedroom it's own balcony with mountain views. With 3 large bedrooms & 2 bathrooms (master ensuite) you have all the space you need. The main level features new vinyl floors an open layout with 2 living areas and large updated kitchen. BONUS Flex room downstairs perfect for teenagers or movie night! The complex recently had the roof replaced (2017) and decks redone (2015). Priced below assessment = great value here. With 2 decks & a private patio you have lots of outdoor space. Lots of visitor parking, close to shopping, schools, transit and trails. Hurry!
